item.title: About Bob Martin's talk - The Future of Programming (2016)
item.description: I am a bit late to the party, but still. Robert C. Martin, colloquially known as “Uncle Bob”, gave the exciting talk in May 2016 about the future of the programming. The usefulness of his words still stands, and it is a beautiful history lesson about software engineering, programming as a profession with remarks about Agile and possible future of the industry.
